biography: Daniel, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, brings a blend of seasoned experience and quiet determination to the greens. Representing Oulujokilaakson Golfklubi ry, Daniel has carved out a reputation as a formidable competitor, marked by strategic play and an unwavering focus.

With 7 past appearances at the Hector Trophée and 2 victories, Daniel's track record speaks volumes about his capabilities in pair formats. While the Victor trophy has eluded him, his consistent performance underscores a commitment to excellence and a deep understanding of the game. Daniel is known for his calm demeanor under pressure, a trait that often unsettles his opponents.

Though not currently slated to participate in Hector Trophée 2025, Daniel remains an active presence in the Hector events. Known for his meticulous preparation and analytical approach to the game, should he decide to join, he would undoubtedly be one to watch. Daniel's dedication to golf extends beyond competition; he is often seen mentoring younger players, imparting his knowledge and passion for the sport.
